name: Generic Shooter MMO
description:
KEYBOARD CONTROLS

W/A/S/D = MOVE

LEFT SHIFT = DASH

SPACEBAR = SHOOT

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

LEFT STICK = MOVE

BUTTON WEST = DASH

BUTTON SOUTH = SHOOT

This game was made in 13 hours in total, for Indie Tales Game Jam, with the duration of 2 days. All assets made by me.
